attributes.action: Remove the CQC’s license as an Independent Governing Body over Care Homes, etc.
attributes.additional_details: Revoke the license as not fit for purpose.
attributes.background: Go to The People’s Care Watchdog Support Group, read of all the cases where our Elderly are being abused neglected and violated. The CQC have been informed on numerous occasions, no support is forthcoming to families. In some cases Care Providers are being targeted while others are being favoured

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We understand that you would like to see changes to how care homes are regulated, but we're not sure if you would just like the CQC to be removed as a regulator, or if you would like to see changes to the way the CQC grant licences to care homes.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
